name: An unPharo-seeable Future
description:
Story of a pharaoh who performs a dark ritual, in his death to ascend to godhood.The player is a young man affected by this ritual, and in his grief makes a pact with the god Osiris who is disgusted by the perversion which gains him access to the otherworld and a tremendous power ( A magic Ankh ). He uses this power to hunt the soul of the pharaoh and banish it before it can achieve godhood.

Game:

An egyptian themed dungeon crawler Hey all, this is our first gamejam, and first game ever made for some of us. We unfortunately didn’t finish it with the story or get to playtest it, as we “finished it” 2 min before deadline. The game will be buggy, and is extremely hard. Send a screenshot if you can beat it, because we cant.

Old version:

https://gabaloose.itch.io/an-unpharo-seeable-future
